rev.comment: minor re-wording: computer might not need to be compromised, like the ABC case shows
rev.diff:
Line 222: Line 222:
===Covert "mining"===
===Covert "mining"===
â
In June, 2011, [[Symantec]] warned about the possibility of [[botnet]]s engaging in covert "mining" of bitcoins (unauthorized use of resources of compromised computers to generate bitcoins).<ref>http://www.symantec.com/connect/blogs/bitcoin-botnet-mining</ref>. Later that month, and employee of [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation|ABC]] was caught after using the company's servers to generate bitcoins.<ref>http://thenextweb.com/au/2011/06/23/abc-employee-caught-mining-for-bitcoins-on-company-servers/</ref>
+
In June, 2011, [[Symantec]] warned about the possibility of [[botnet]]s engaging in covert "mining" of bitcoins (unauthorized use of resources of computers to generate bitcoins).<ref>http://www.symantec.com/connect/blogs/bitcoin-botnet-mining</ref>. Later that month, and employee of [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation|ABC]] was caught after using the company's servers to generate bitcoins.<ref>http://thenextweb.com/au/2011/06/23/abc-employee-caught-mining-for-bitcoins-on-company-servers/</ref>
